images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing warm beaches and sunsets.
AI-selected This image will highlight the beauty of Thailand's beaches and cultural elements, enhancing the campaign's focus on relaxation and adventure.
AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts, making the promotional aspect of the campaign clear and engaging.
AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts, making the promotional aspect of the campaign clear and engaging.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trustworthiness in the promotional campaign.
AI-selected This pattern will serve as a background element, enhancing the overall aesthetic of the email while maintaining a tropical and vibrant feel.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting sunny beaches, warm weather, and cultural elements of Thailand

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thailand's beaches and sunsets
assetRequirements.content_context: highlighting the tropical landscape and inviting atmosphere

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в экзотику Таиланда этой осенью!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing warm beaches and sunsets.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
